alert.note: Alert for Eastern Orleans; Lower St. Bernard; Northern St. Tammany; Southeast St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 22 at 6:13PM CST until February 23 at 10:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Upper St. Bernard, Lower St. Bernard, Southeast St. Tammany, Western Orleans, Eastern Orleans, Northern St. Tammany and Southwestern St. Tammany Parishes. In Mississippi, Hancock, Harrison and Jackson Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Impacts are expected to be greater closer to the Mississippi coast.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Orleans; Lower St. Bernard; Northern St. Tammany; Southeast St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans
